response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the fridge. The next step is to open the fridge to access the potato.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the potato
(4) Cook the potato
(5) Move to the bottom cabinet
(6) Open the bottom cabinet
(7) Take out the platter
(8) Put the cooked potato on the platter
(9) Move to the breakfast table
(10) Serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Open the fridge
    fridge = registry(env,"fridge_xyejdx_0")
    open(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
